<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved all available models","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"modelId":{"type":"string","description":"The id of the model"},"permittedModelId":{"type":"string","description":"The id of the model. Null if the model is not permitted.","nullable":true},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the model"},"provider":{"type":"string","enum":["openai","anthropic","mistral","ollama","synaforce","ayunis"],"description":"The provider of the model"},"displayName":{"type":"string","description":"The display name of the model"},"canStream":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model can stream"},"isReasoning":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model can reason"},"canUseTools":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model can use tools"},"isPermitted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model is permitted to be used"},"isDefault":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model is the default model"},"isEmbedding":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the model is an embedding model"}},"required":["modelId","permittedModelId","name","provider","displayName","canStream","isReasoning","canUseTools","isPermitted","isDefault","isEmbedding"],"title":"ModelWithConfigResponseDto"}}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
